Reference

Pins

Functions for pinning, finding, retrieving and sharing remote resources.

Pin Resource

pin_find()

Find Pin

pin_get()

Retrieve Pin

Pin Info

Reactive Pin

Remove Pin

pin_versions()

Pin Versions

Boards

Alias functions to help register boards.

board_register()

Register Board

board_register_azure() board_azure()

Register Azure Board

board_register_github() board_github()

Register GitHub Board

board_register_local() board_local()

Register Local Board

board_register_rsconnect() board_rsconnect()

Register RStudio Connect Board

board_register_s3() board_s3()

Register S3 Board
